text: [An la hai yi] yi mulan zhi nu ma'er ya [zhu][wei xinshimen she ge biyu], ta baochile ziji de zhenjie, suoyi, wo tongguo wo de jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] ba ta [er sa] chui ru ta de tinei, ta zhengshile ta de zhu de yanyu [an la chuangzao yi jian wu shi, zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.] Que shi zhenli, ta chengxin ta [an la] de suoyou jingdian, ta shi fucong [an la] zhe.
